chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the following issue.
Thank you,

Hello ecomobile,    

The customer has expressed his wish to cancel the order 40596784.    

Please stop the shipment and proceed with the refund.    

If the parcel has already been dispatched, please contact the carrier directly and ask them to stop the delivery and return the parcel to your warehouse. This will allow you to collect the product more quickly.  

We look forward to hearing from you,

Anthonio, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

I have informed our logistics partner to cancel this order and will process the refund once confirmation has been received from them.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
